newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Board of Kuwait's Commercial Bank resigns.
newsitem.headline: Board of Kuwait's Commercial Bank resigns.

text.p: Chairman and board members of the Commercial Bank of Kuwait submitted their resignations on Wednesday to the bank's general assembly, the bank said on Thursday.
"The regular general assembly (meeting) has approved the resignation submitted by the members of the board of directors," a bank statement said. It did not give a reason for the resignation.
Chairman Hamad al-Hamad said the board had served its purpose of increasing the bank's profits and its status in the banking sector, al-Anba newspaper said.
The statement said the members of the board will keep their posts until new members are elected.
Bank officials did not have immediate comment.
